draw-and-break.title: Draw and Break - A Fun and Strategic Puzzle Game
draw-and-break.slogan: Draw, Strategize, and Break Your Way to Victory!
draw-and-break.description: Draw and Break is a casual puzzle game where you put your strategic thinking to the test! Your goal is simple: draw lines to guide bouncing balls and hit the delicious donuts! Plan your moves carefully, create the perfect path, and watch the balls bounce their way to victory.

HomeIframe.title: Draw and Break
HomeIframe.description: Experience the thrill of Draw and Break, a puzzle game that challenges your strategic thinking. Draw lines to guide bouncing balls and hit the donuts!

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Draw and Break is a casual puzzle game where you put your strategic thinking to the test! Your goal is simple: draw lines to guide bouncing balls and hit the delicious donuts!
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Use the left mouse button to draw lines.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Guide the bouncing balls to hit the donuts.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Plan your moves carefully to create the perfect path.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Challenge your strategic thinking with every move.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Use the left mouse button to draw and interact with the in-game UI.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Enjoy hours of fun with this addictive puzzle game.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Aim for the donuts and watch the balls bounce their way to victory.
